document.full_text: syrian security forces stormed a town near the city of banias on tuesday, activists said, in an operation aimed at quelling unrest that has spread across the country and challenged the rule of president bashar al-assad.
document.title: syrian forces storm town after protest say activists
lines_and_colors: syrian security forces stormed a town near the city of banias on tuesday, activists said, in an operation aimed at quelling unrest that has spread across the country and challenged the rule of president bashar al-assad.
